website_summaries.verdict: A solid residential system with 4 bullet-style cameras that can provide durable exterior surveillance.
pros: Nice housing that does a good job on weatherproofing
cons: This wired system is more reliable than wireless, but can require extensive installation effort

customer_reviews.title: Purchased/installed in June 2018. Have already had two cameras fail
customer_reviews.text: One camera stopped working completed one month after purchase and another one 3 months later with water damage. Have had these cameras replaced but the durability leaves much to be desired. I recommend another brand such as Hikvision or Ubiquiti.
customer_reviews.author: A O.

customer_reviews.title: garbage
customer_reviews.text: After using it for only 5 months the unit stopped working. Do not buy this. Your only technical support is through e-mail to somewhere in Asia. They want you to unscrew the unit yourself, remove the HD and do all kinds of things and it takes a day to get an answer to the next step. In short, you are your own repair person to get it working. Had I known there is no phone tech support I would never had bought it. I am still trying to get them to replace it according to their 2 year warranty replacement policy but I don't know if they will honor their promise. Will update later. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: californiagirl

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: The NVR unit not worth your money . Hard drive stop workin two month after purchase. Try to contact Reolink with no success. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: carlton

customer_reviews.title: Frequent Video loss
customer_reviews.text: 2 weeks into using the cameras and most of them now have video loss issues every few hours. Sometimes it connects and sometimes it doesn't. Have to reboot the NVR almost every day. The camera resolution isn't really great for 4k camera. Returning the system as there is no direct contact for customer service
customer_reviews.author: VG

customer_reviews.title: What a awesome system. easy to install and the picture in ...
customer_reviews.text: What a awesome system. easy to install and the picture in every camera is very good. I would definitely recommend this system to anyone looking to buy one for their home or small business.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Beatty

customer_reviews.title: buy the one with dome cameras
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the kit with 8 channel dvr and 4 bulletn cameras, also ordered 4 dome cameras to complete the dvr, bullet cameras got water inside and damaged all 4 when rained, good thing sellere reponded quickly and sent me bullet ammeras replacement... and... again same water issue, fianlly i asked them to send dome cameras instead the other bullet cameras, now system is working exellent with great quality picture during day and night, you can see license plates from 60ft away
customer_reviews.author: Daniel JL

customer_reviews.title: GREAT system, easy to setup and use.  Clear day/night images.  Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.text: This camera setup exceeded our expectations! We have been having neighbor problems and these cameras have been extremely useful in providing the clear night time photos/video we needed to prove our case. We were able to place them around the property to effect full coverage. The images are sharp both day and night. We purchased additional cameras since we were so happy with the results we have had. The installation was clear, the setup was accurate. We are definitely recommending this system to our (other) neighbors and co-workers. Take look at the attached photos and judge for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: A. Pruitt

customer_reviews.title: NVR needs work
customer_reviews.text: The NVR software is not as good as I hoped it was. I am not able to record 24/7 and have motion setup at the same time. My old camera system had the ability to record 24/7 and set markers in the playback view to show were motion was detected. This made looking through video much quicker. The closest thing I found was to set it to record 24/7 and have it email me when motion was detected. Another thing to note is that I was able to get live video working on my Linux system. I created a tutorial if anyone is interested.
customer_reviews.author: Jes

customer_reviews.title: Beyond terrible
customer_reviews.text: Unless you live in a treehouse, these cameras are horrible. Installed all 4, using the cables provided, 2 of the cables were short so I purchased extensions. Kept getting message video lost, no signal. I then replaced all wiring for CAT6, still nothing, only 1 camera worked. I then purchased externaste/booster, and another camera worked but the other 2 didn’t. To resume, I worked for 2 days, spent a bunch of money and returned it. With I could give 0 stars, but I won’t let me. Do yourself a favor, don’t waste your money. If you ever need customer support, good luck lol
customer_reviews.author: William Geronco

customer_reviews.title: Good security camera system for home and/or business.
customer_reviews.text: Installed six of these Reolink camera systems for both homes and businesses with no issues. System is easy to install and configure. Video is very clear and night video is good as well. Motion detection also works well. Recordings on a 2TB system with all 8 cameras will only store video for less than one week. Will need to set cameras to “record motion only” in order to store video for longer periods. System does not come with mounting boxes for cameras. You will need to purchase mounting boxes separately if you wish to hide the camera wire harnesses. Overall, a decent security camera system at a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: FreedomWins

customer_reviews.title: Destroys hard drives
customer_reviews.text: I'm going on my third hard drive and I'm just about to leave for vacation tomorrow so I have to replace the hard drive in this damn thing before I leave tomorrow what a joke it destroy hard drives there's no reason for hard drive to die after 6 months but this one did and the one before it did to they just eat hard drives which is important to have when you're trying to record video you can't have any play back cuz your hard drive needs formatted . they're just junk
customer_reviews.author: Victor Olszewski Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Overall decent, but software and website are lacking
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like these cameras, they give pretty good quality video both day and night and its basically simple and straight forward to install, but if you have questions, the website needs attention and the software is not as intuitive as it could be. There's no support for viewing in chrome (only internet explorer /cry) and accessing the cameras remotely via the web is confusing. There are a ton of settings that have no explanation at all and its just not clear how to access recordings, etc. Hardware, A+, everything else, D-
customer_reviews.author: Dennis T. Ivy Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I am taking 2 stars off for customer service. After a year on my work barn, the NVR went bad. Still Under warranty I had to go through endless emails, they could not find where I had registered it bla bla bla. I had to pay 35 bucks up front in pay pal for shipping and such. It got to the point I blew up and let them have a good chewing out. I got my point across they sent me a new NVR and they did not collect the money from Pay Pal. MAKE SURE WHEN YOU REGISTER IT, YOU MAKE A COPY OF IT. Other than that the system works well, good resolution even at night.
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: Great Night Vision!!
customer_reviews.text: Installed cameras and set up system. At first the night vision was very poor. Purchased some additional lighting, but it did not improve the video. Finally figured out my street lights were reflecting off my house and were basically blinding my cameras. Cameras would show the side of the house very well or tree branches to the side of the camera, but I could not see my driveway and yard. Pointed the cameras away from the house, trimmed some branches, and now I see my yard and driveway clear as day. Cameras have a real wide angle. You have to point the cameras further out than you think. Take advantage of the wide angle lenses!!
customer_reviews.author: Duck

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera Set
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd brand of surveillance cameras I have tried and I am sure this will be my last, because these cameras and NVR are great!! I have owned Swan, Q-See and they were awful. The Reolink cameras are way better and the NVR was easy to setup. I was able to get email alerts setup easily with their online help page. I had extra cameras from my last brand and was able to monitor them via Reolink. I had to get those cameras on a POE switch to do it though, just an FYI. So I have the original 4 that came with this set and 3 others from the other brand and they all work.
customer_reviews.author: the bottom line

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great.
customer_reviews.text: Good surveillance system for the money. Installation is simple, basically plug and play and instructions are very clear. Range of motion adjustment is a great feature, when the motion is detected on your driveway you see everything happening on the street but you can block the street motion so it doesn’t trigger the cameras when the cars are just passing by. Night vision is great with one exception, license plate on vehicles look sort of like bright light and unable to see/read them. One star out for that. We live in a very safe neighborhood so this is enough for us. Installed to monitor our lurking through the fence trespassing obnoxious neighbor who’s mental health is questionable :P
customer_reviews.author: Ark

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply Made, Read bad reviews!
customer_reviews.text: I returned it. System was already opened (possible retuned item) and the be honest it feels cheaply made, the metal casing is really thin on the cameras!. (The Foscams I bought is twice the weight and sturdiness) I got this system for the price and after seeing so many good reviews. Then I read through all the bad reviews, and seen an underlaying problem. The system is poorly grounded (NOT SAFE) and the company is from HongKong and seems to have terrible customer service. Theres a reason this system is so cheap, and thats not what Im looking for.
customer_reviews.author: S3Q

customer_reviews.title: This system is easy to setup on both hardware and software
customer_reviews.text: This system is easy to setup on both hardware and software. PoE and four Ethernet network cables bundle make it easy to do the hardware setup. The software on the NVR is very easy to follow as well (I just read the quick start guide briefly without checking the manual on the bundle mini CD.) The only improvement I would recommend is that it should have a cover for both power and reset buttons on the camera pigtails.
customer_reviews.author: PC Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install- crisp daytime pictures!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install!! There are several things I’ve got to get used to compared to my old WiFi cameras. The day time pictures are crisp and clear- the nighttime infrared attracts bugs unlike my other infrared cameras. The motion works great but I haven’t been able to find a balance between the leaves blowing and actual people or animals. That is something you have to play with the sensitivity to get. The infrared is focused on a smaller areas than what I’m used to but overall these are great cameras... It will take some time to get used to and try and find the balance of sensitivity so as not to get so many false notifications.
customer_reviews.author: janet A

customer_reviews.title: An actual system that works!
customer_reviews.text: After having an NVR system already that never really worked we were skeptical about another system however felt that we didn't want to buy anymore of the same product and began seeking alternatives. We came across this system and compared it heavily to DVR and other NVR systems and finally settled. Literally straight out of the box this system is plug and play and user friendly. The app works great and so does the web/computer interface. Setting up the detail features (scheduled recording/motion detection) is so easy and works Across all platforms! The color night vision is just what we needed for one of our cameras and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Marie

customer_reviews.title: The picture is great night and day
customer_reviews.text: I am a week in after installation and I have ordered two more cameras. I bought what I needed up front and now I am covering everything. The picture is great night and day. This is a very good product. Its is relatively simple to install for what I would assume is the average handy guy. Im not that guy. I am a general contractor and can do just about anything. This was simple. I used the a bar code reader to scan the barcode completing the IQ challenge. Manufacturer is very helpful and follows up with purchasers. I have recommended this to other family members and they have purchased this system as well.
customer_reviews.author: Bensaplayin

customer_reviews.title: Worth the effort!
customer_reviews.text: Running cabling throughout your home may or may not be a big deal, but it's by far the most reliable way to get your security system up and running, and keep it that way. The picture quality is great, and being POE powered means you can expand it easily by connecting cameras to a PoE switch, and there's only one wire to run. You can extend the reach by simply joining standard network cables together if the included 100ft. cables aren't enough. The only thing I really wish for was a 2x/4x/8x speed playback option for playback, instead of having to jump to certain times. I'm currently running 6 cameras on my system and love it.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Good quality video
customer_reviews.text: My previous NVR was a Swann unit. When 2 of the cameras crapped out, I contacted Swann to find out which cameras were compatible. They told me there weren't any. So I decided to switch to this Reolink unit. Well, as it turns out, the cameras, the NVR, and even the software are virtually identical to the Swann, and in fact are made by the same manufacturer. Best part: the price of the Reolink is a fraction of what I had paid for Swann. Setup and installation is simple. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: amazon24926

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for buck
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased and installed a bunch of these systems for myself, all of my close family, and some friends. For the quality per price point you can't go wrong. All Poe which is awesome. NVRs are easy to navigate and the app is simple and nice. I've had my system for over a year and still going strong. No quality issues. If you need cameras this is the brand to go with. All in all I've purchased 6 NVR systems some 8ch and some 16cg and additional cameras. So more than 60+ cameras and have never had any problems. Pics are of night vision which isn't bad but daytime is much sharper and great color representation.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: it works flawlessly so far.
customer_reviews.text: we had older POE security camera system in past and setting it up was such a headache, especially setting up forwarding protocol etc. This system is such a breeze to setup. Within few minutes, everything was available on my android app. Motion detection is very sensitive and you can adjust sensitivity and area of motion detection. Wonderful software and video upload is pretty fast. very happy with the system and price is very good. You can add additional camera for mere $59. Only negative is audio quality is not that great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, easy setup, works great
customer_reviews.text: bought these for my second home. Added a HD to it, mounted the cameras, ran the wires and setup was a breeze. you will want to have an hdmi monitor or TV nearby to get the initial setup going. Once you have the app running on your phone, you don't need to do anything else. To add to that, I didn't have to modify the firewall, didn't have to do anything a non techie would be stuck with, it just works and works everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great except for the bright red or lights at nigjt
customer_reviews.text: Everything was very easy to connect and picture quality was good my frustration was when checking the night time quality I realized the ir lights glow bright red. They stand out like a beacon screaming to anyone where the cameras are located.
customer_reviews.author: Adam DeCock

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: The best system hands down. take the time to install right and you will be thankful later. the only problem was keeping the nvr in the bedroom. it was quite loud so I lengthened all the cords and ran it into the closet. easy install. 5 months 24 hr monitoring and no problems. 3 lies and a garbage can thief caught. Moble app is friendly and works fine.
customer_reviews.author: blah

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and setup!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and setup. Got it working right away. It works as advertised, but beware if it fails. I’m knocking out a few stars, because of their tech support and warranty policies. The 2TB failed 3 month later, way after the amazon return window, but it’s still under their warranty. Their tech support will do/say (repetitively) whatever it takes to avoid a warranty replacement. Also their return policy only supports returns purchases directly from them, not from amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin’s Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Good equipment; setup instructions need help!
customer_reviews.text: First off, I want to compliment the rep who I called and who talked me thru the 'fix', her name was Lori, for without her assistance, I would probably have been sending another camera back, thinking it was bad. As it turns out, once explained, it's easy to understand the settings and how the cameras work in conjunction with the NVR. My only criticism would be the setup instructions for the NVR and how to link up the cameras. They need to be more detailed for those of us who are not too tech-savvy. Otherwise, the equipment works fine and the quality is outstanding....Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Mark J. Myler

customer_reviews.title: Reolink RLK8 system is almost perfect!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this Reolink system to add some peace of mind and security to our home. And so far we absolutely love this system. It was a breeze setup. We literally plugged the NVR into the internet modem and power outlet, scanned the qpr code using the Reolink app and that was it. Plugged in and mounted the cameras around my house and boom, all done.
customer_reviews.author: devin phillips

customer_reviews.title: Great system for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Order came nicely packaged with all items, nothing missing. Set up is easy as pie, the hardest part is running the POE Cat5 wires, and even that isn't that hard. I had wireless cameras in the past, with issues, the POE cameras are the way to go. The software is typical of any security system and after a few minutes you will be a pro. The cameras work nicely and are sharp and clear. The night vision is excellent. For the money this system cannot be beat!!
customer_reviews.author: Cliff H.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and use.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect and easy to set up (although does require an external monitor and VGA cable in order to set up). Easily expandable with new cameras. I ended up adding 3 more of different kinds to complete my installation. Mobile app worked flawlessly and I could see the cameras from anywhere at any time. The best thing about PoE is that you only need to run a single cable per camera...no additional power source needed.
customer_reviews.author: Alistair

customer_reviews.title: remote acces via phone doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchase this camera due to high rating However I do have to give this system Two star rating due to one thing that matters to me the most. Remote access with my phone It simply doesn't work even when I have full signal on my phone I still get failed access. If you google multiple people complaining about remote access I might have to return this system if I cant view my property when I'm way on vacation what is the pint then.
customer_reviews.author: X

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice all around. Money well spent!!
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit that this item impressed me very much. The clarity of the video, especially at night is unbelievable. The installation was quite easy as well. I had to contact customer service and I was told my issues would be resolved within 24 hours. They were resolved in less then one hour. DefinTely made the right choice by going with this company.
customer_reviews.author: David D

customer_reviews.title: Take your time and be patient...
customer_reviews.text: Had an issue with the HDD 1 1/2 months after use. Had to re-format (occurred erasing) and do some tweaking. All n all it works good and picture quality is nice for an inexpensive system. If you're a newbie, read the instructions carefully. Allow plenty of time and take your time.
customer_reviews.author: D B

customer_reviews.title: Awesome system for the price!
customer_reviews.text: The camera system was very easy to install and the configuration was simple. The 4MP camera resolution is very good and the sound is awesome, but it is only one way sound on these cameras. The 8 channel NVR gives me plenty of room to add more cameras in the future. The phone app makes it simple to connect and see what's going on at home at any given moment or if I get an alert that I want to check out. I am looking forward to some even higher resolution cameras to see if I can read license plates at an even further distance. Just make sure that you have enough internet bandwidth to handle all of the cameras.
customer_reviews.author: P S

customer_reviews.title: Silent running NVR
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. Easy to share. Cellular phone app has lots of features and works well. The mouse on the unit goes to sleep and has to be unplugged every time that it is needed. One of the best features is that it appears to be fan-less, it runs silently, it doesn't have that background noise that a lot of NVRs have,
customer_reviews.author: N. Keith

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Install and get up and running in no time at all.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, great pictures day and night. Easy to install and set up. It comes with a wired mouse, I tried to use a wireless mouse but the system would not detect the wireless mouse. Because of where I positioned the NVR, it would be nice if it could use a wireless mouse on the system - unless there is a setting I missed.
customer_reviews.author: Poakey

customer_reviews.title: Reolink Tech support tried to scam me
customer_reviews.text: I received a defective nvr and it would not connect to the internet. The tech support tried to scam me and charge me $59.99 claiming I needed a firewall for my network. Amazon sent me a replacement and it works perfectly now. The night vision isn't the best but the app and cameras are all better than the zosi one I had previously. If it wasn't for the great tech support from Amazon I wouldn't recommend it at all. But do not trust the Reolink tech support
customer_reviews.author: Joyce A. Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I have always Used night owl And so this time I decided to try Reolink And it was the best decision I ever made It is so much easier to work with And to have the audio On the cameras is also awesome I was really worried about the price But so far we have not had any problems at all with the product And I can tell you I will never go back to night owl Thank you Reolink For making such an awesome security system :)
customer_reviews.author: Janine Connors

customer_reviews.title: Great system!!
customer_reviews.text: I have the a reolink 4 camera setup that I bought from amazon and installed myself. Install was simple and didn't have any issues at all. I love it and caught some thieves breaking into the neighbors truck. We submitted it to the police and filed a police report. This system is probably the highest resolution that's commercially out right now, I wish we had access to higher resolutions like 5-6mp range
customer_reviews.author: Blinkn09

customer_reviews.title: great tech support
customer_reviews.text: We were replacing a dated 720 system, this had a good price and upgraded resolution, Since i already had the cable in place install was fast - easier setup than the last with better software and features. Best part was tech support - issue was we could only see cameras on phones when inside the home WiFi. once contacted was directed to inspect and change some settings and I can now see my cameras from work, or away over cell data Happy I got this system.
customer_reviews.author: INfixitGuy

customer_reviews.title: Superlative Product!
customer_reviews.text: The installation and configuration were clear and simple. Everything just worked. The NVR flawlessly discovered wireless cameras that were attached to a separate network and added them seamlessly to the system. For the price, this is the best home surveillance system on the market. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Hombre Sabio

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Camera System
customer_reviews.text: Very user friendly everything is plug and play except for some basic setting like camera etc. High quality images Day and Night even with sunlight in the background. Wide angle lens so they cover large areas. Easy remote access through the app. Can't complain at all just what I needed for my business.
customer_reviews.author: Jean-Luc M.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible technical support - comes out of China
customer_reviews.text: The technical support comes out of China is absolutely horrible ! every issue is a question has to be submitted by email and takes weeks if at all to fix!!! This product is horrible STAY AWAY AND DO NOT PURCHASE.
customer_reviews.author: Al M.

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This product works great so far and with no problems. I have a clear view of the views I wanted and also the audio is awsome you can hear clear of what people are saying outside. I still am messing around with the nvr but sees to be solid so far. Great for the money. This product also has been great in rain storms also. I say give it a try its worth it so far to me .
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Great NVR for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great deal on a package. Several of my cameras are on my internal network, 2 of them are over WIFI. Reolink NVR found them with zero issues. Setup was very easy, unit operates quietly. Long term storage, and over-write of old files is simple and works well. Augmented my Ring camera network, and has ultimately replaced it.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Maassen

customer_reviews.title: Great first home security system! Easy DIY!
customer_reviews.text: Just finished installing the system! It was very straightforward and easy. The cables provided were perfect! I only needed to buy one cable because it was 60+ feet from the dvr. My only recommendation would be to make the Ethernet heads less bulky so they fit through the water right seal adapter easier. I need to trim the edges to get it to fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: MUCH better than Lorex
customer_reviews.text: I bought an Arlo Pro 2 and was not satisfied, mostly because of the constant motion notifications and the fact that you couldn't record continuously without a monthly fee. I then tried a CC system through Lorex. This was one of the worst experiences I've ever had with technology and customer service. An impossible setup and horrendous customer service. Then I tried ReoLink and found the light. Install couldn't have been easier. The picture is extremely clear day and night and the fact that it can record continuously on a hard drive is a huge plus for me. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Liam Petit

customer_reviews.title: ReoLink support is fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I had a camera start having problems with its color saturation and hue. It was under warranty so I contacted Reolink RMA support to get it replaced or repaired. Before I was given a RMA# the support team troubleshot it and sent me a Firmware upgrade to correct the problem with out me sending the camera in, saving me down time and the hassle of being without a camera. Thank You Reolink Support Team
customer_reviews.author: bob czysz

customer_reviews.title: Video clarity HELPED CATCH A THEIF.
customer_reviews.text: I mostly don't leave any review but this is worth mentioning. I set one camera on each corner of my house just in case something happend. I had a home intruder in broad daylight enter my home while I was in the next room. These cameras video was so clear they helped me identify the theif within four hours of posting it on line. Everybody I show the video including the police officers were impressed on the clarity of the video. The officers tracked him down and arrested him the next day. I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: luis gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Great system, great price
customer_reviews.text: Great system, great price, easy install. The one and only downside w/ this system vs. a more expensive one is the camera mounts are kind of lame - no right/left pivot whatsoever, so the camera must be tilted to get a good left or right shot if not shooting perpendicular off the structure. Great system though - definitely worth the price - I've installed several and my clients love them.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Needs better remote playback.
customer_reviews.text: Installed these under the eves in my house outside. The only isssue I have is remote playback is hard to get working. It takes 3-4 attempts of starting playback to finally get a response. By then the alert has passed. I had to also port forward the remote viewing port. Camera quality is great. Wish the Lense was wider. This was the best value system I could find. Notifications are a bit sensations. I had to turn them all the way down and still get warnings from the wind.
customer_reviews.author: DWN

customer_reviews.title: Interface is terrible, price is too high for what you get
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the picture is pretty good. As usual the interface/software is a let down. Online support is a joke. The reference info online and what came with do not match or do what it states. Even the pictures they show have different screens than what I have. Upgraded software and still the same. Disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: William T.

customer_reviews.title: Simple. Plug-and-Play. Great System
customer_reviews.text: Great NVR for the price. Setup is a breeze. I had another "cheaper" NVR in place, Reolink was replacing it. I had all Cat5 wires ran already, all I had to do is swap the cameras, and replace the NVR box, and POOF all started working. NVR detected all camera no problem, all I had to do is configure camera names and motion detection sensitivity, other than that, plug-and-play. I had a little hiccup with the NVR itself, but support was responsive and got everything squared away. I like it so much, I bought an additional PTZ (pan-tilt-zoom) camera RLC-423 for the system. All works great.
customer_reviews.author: Cymek

customer_reviews.title: Support is important and Reolink came through!
customer_reviews.text: I have had my system a few years. The cameras are very clear and the recorder has the ability to keep days worth of video. I just had the phone app lock me out and I had to contact tech support. Scott was amazing and very helpful. He is also patient as I am not the most tech savvy person. He walked me through the steps and got my app working again. I do recommend Reolink systems for anyone in need of security for their home or office. Thank you again!
customer_reviews.author: Buy Too Much 😉!

customer_reviews.title: Great CCTV System
customer_reviews.text: The system was very easy to get up and running. The documentation regarding the hookup was very good, however the documentation regarding the operational features was lagging. Having said that, it was very easy to figure it out. The picture quality is excellent. All-in-all I'm very pleased with the system.
customer_reviews.author: JMM

customer_reviews.title: Very nice system!
customer_reviews.text: Everything was well packed and protected. I read a lot of reviews before deciding to buy this one and it didn't disappoint. Setup was extremely easy and straightforward. The cameras are very solid and the resolution is great. I didn't opt for any additional cameras because I wanted to see how well the system worked. I'll be buying a few more to maximize my coverage. The app is very easy to use and my house already feels more secure.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy P.

customer_reviews.title: Love these cameras
customer_reviews.text: There’s not a lot of options for Ethernet capable home security cameras in the market right now. My home had cables in place so I wanted to take advantage rather than utilize shoddy WiFi. These have not disappointed so far! Quality picture and functionality. Can you get a little better picture and get a Nest? Yes, but you pay a good amount more, lose Ethernet stability, and gain a little better picture. Absolutely would recommend these to anyone looking for a hard wired camera.
customer_reviews.author: NR

customer_reviews.title: Security and multi tasking
customer_reviews.text: After some research and talking to a tech friend, I ordered the bullet cameras due to quality of cameras and that the cameras were powered via Ethernet instead of batteries. While we use the cameras for security purposes, my husband and I also use them to watch the kids play in the backyard while we work on different projects inside the house. Because we wanted the cameras recording a large portion of the day, cameras that were powered by ethernet was an important feature to us. All in all, very happy with this product and the app and would recommend it to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was an easy install. Holes for camera wire gave us little ...
customer_reviews.text: Was an easy install. Holes for camera wire gave us little trouble, only had to make them kind of big to fit the three parts of the cable. Nice to be able to view cameras from my phone. Quality of recorded video is very nice during day time. Night video could be better. Haven't gotten to mess with the motion detection but it doesn't seem like the greatest part of the software. Would definitely recommend for first timers, very easy to setup.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost a good buy
customer_reviews.text: The cameras worked great until the first rain. I have had to take apart 3 to drain out water and now 2 of them dont work. I guess if u are going to have them completely covered they are a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Easy setup. Good quality. Solid construction. Highly recommend this product. The only issue is the very noisy cooling fan inside the hard drive unit. With a silent fan it would be perfect. Was having issues with seller about honoring the advertised rebates. After a few emails and a call to Amazon customer service, discounts where issued.
customer_reviews.author: SilverSurfer

customer_reviews.title: Great image quality.
customer_reviews.text: My customer needed new cameras since half of his old cameras had died. I used this system to replace an old coax based camera system and he is loving the clarity and detail of these new cameras. The office manager found out she could zoom in on the picture with the magnifying glass and was thrilled to be able to read the brochures in the customers' hands. Gotta say, I was impressed with that one.
customer_reviews.author: WinterMute Technologies, LLC

customer_reviews.title: Best camera system out right now
customer_reviews.text: This really is one of the best systems out when it comes to the video quality and the fair pricing. I purchased and installed this system in 2017 and it has been awesome! I wanted a wired system with a clear picture with remote view capability and I was not let down. Easy to mount with only one wire going to each camera so there is no guess work. Even tech support is great which really makes the product stand out from the others. I even purchased an additional 5MP camera to add to the system and it was literally plug and play.
customer_reviews.author: Cole

customer_reviews.title: Nice System
customer_reviews.text: I am really impressed with the quality of this system considering the price. This system is well worth it and more. Works really well and wasn't very hard to set up. I've had it up and running for the past couple of months and have not had any problems at all. The quality of the video is very good.
customer_reviews.author: LJF

customer_reviews.title: Great hardwired security cameras
customer_reviews.text: We do not have a good wireless provider where we live and needed a hardwired set. We connected them to a computer monitor and it provides a split screen for all four cameras. Day time looks good/ has night vision. You can rewind, zoom and it tags places when it detects movement.
customer_reviews.author: debalena

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny & More
customer_reviews.text: We bought this camera system after both of our cars were broken into. My husband is the research king. He looked at all kinds of systems and felt this was the best one at the best price. He has had to tweak on it a little bit. It is a wonderful system that has given me peace of mind. You cannot beat that.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Clements

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend good price
customer_reviews.text: Great Clarity easy to install And set up in home and I on phone You’ll just have to play with the sensitivity level because if you set the sensitivity level to high everything makes the alarm go off rain snow bugs
customer_reviews.author: Robert D.

customer_reviews.title: I have been pleased with the ease of set up and the quality ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had these installed for almost a year now. I have been pleased with the ease of set up and the quality of the picture they produce both during the day and the IR at night.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Nice Picture
customer_reviews.text: I get a good clean picture in live view. The only reason this isn't 5 stars is because the recordings have a low frame rate, and I don't remember this being advertised. Other than that the product is good.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Solid system with great app support. Worth the extra money over similar units.
customer_reviews.text: Great system setup is easy and remote accessibility is far superior to any security systems I’ve used. The mobile app is stable and responsive. If you’re on the fence and that feature is important to you. Don’t hesitate. Camera quality and night vision are great. The fan on the unit is a little noisy if you have this in a quiet room, but it’s tolerable. I did not need to do any firmware updates. Both the nvr and the cameras were up to date out of the box. I would recommend testing all the cameras before you get everything mounted, just Incase you do get a doa. Customer service was friendly and helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up, works well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this system over a year ago and have the 4 cameras monitoring the outside of my home. Everything is still working well. I recently upgraded the firmware and required technical support to get the correct version and was answered within a day. Very pleased with this system.
customer_reviews.author: Bitsmasher

customer_reviews.title: Terrific value! Easy installation!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy installation; the hardest part is running the wires. Plug and play once wires are ran. Very intuitive software both hard drive and phone app. Video quality is great. I highly recommend this. One note - it’s very easy to round out the screws provided with the camera mount, so be careful.
customer_reviews.author: msupc

customer_reviews.title: Great build quality & awesome customer service
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for such a low price. Images are sharp & cameras work remotely with no issues. Customer service is outstanding; I wanted to replace one camera and the process was smooth like butter.
customer_reviews.author: Wally

customer_reviews.title: Best system ever!!
customer_reviews.text: We love this camera system. Wide angle with sound. Love the fact we can see on our phones when we not at home. I also have it on my tv so when my husband is gone I can hear if anyone comes close in our back yard. I’ve had camera for about 20 years. Easy to set up. You don’t have to hook up where your router is. Just buy a WiFi extender is what I did. Best unit I ever had. Well worth the price!!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs king

customer_reviews.title: Good cameras so far.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good I like the fact that at night time there is a red ring led that switch on for the night vision ,you can see it from far away, This will keep away whom ever is planing on tracpassing as he,s being watch before the damage is done. Picture quality is good .
customer_reviews.author: my revewi

customer_reviews.title: Replaced my Samsung system with Reolink!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Was just going to add this to my home with my Samsung system but decided after connecting the first camera that I would just replace the Samsung with the Reolink! The Reolink has much better quality, the app blows the Samsung out of the water and it’s 100x easer to install. I pulled the Samsung system out and sold it to buy two more cameras for this system. Way to go Reolink!
customer_reviews.author: Josh Johnston

customer_reviews.title: I recommend them
customer_reviews.text: This set is amazing. I worked with top brand cameras before but this tops them all. Set up of cameras as well as phone (iPhone) app was a breeze. Picture quality is excellent. I think reolink made sweet cameras I’ve been looking for. It’s been about a month but so far we are supper happy. We’ll see how long they’ll last.
customer_reviews.author: Bazsanya

customer_reviews.title: The camera dont last very long, app not very user friendly to recover footage.
customer_reviews.text: These camera worked well for a relatively short time after which 2 camera simply failed. I replaced them and had another new one fail a few months later. They are not the cheapest cameras out there and there is very little to do once they fail. Might be worth investing in another brand as I tried replacing with another POE camera with a different brand but it did not work
customer_reviews.author: Trinidude

customer_reviews.title: Happy Camper
customer_reviews.text: Like it so far a bit challenging to learn NVR and invidual camera settings ETC but functionality is great be prepared to read and trial and error before you finalize-0- may want to get some 2.5-3" marine shrink wrap to water proof outdoor POE pig tail connections preven cottosion moisture etc
customer_reviews.author: Floyd T. Turbo

customer_reviews.title: Technical support is terrible. Phone is always no answer
customer_reviews.text: Technical support is terrible. Phone is always no answer. Only way is email. Sometimes it took one day or a couple days to reply. Motion alarm setting is unacceptable. Motion recording and alarm are combined together. If you want set motion alarm. You have to set it every day every camera manually.
customer_reviews.author: guohuazeng

customer_reviews.title: Great Cameras- Great System
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the RLK8 in December of 2016 because we live in a fairly remote area and my wife and I are both away from the house alot. The install went extremely easy. I placed the 3 bullet camera on the exterior of the house, 1 dome in the living room and 1 in the garage. I then placed RLC-423 and a bullet on trees about 20 feet away from The 2 main entrances to our house. This was to give us another angle prospective. For the cameras on trees I dug and placed the wire in conduit. I had done much research prior to purchasing This system and 9 months after the install we are still very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Weather”proof” vs weather”resistant. Camera housings appear to be powder coated metal, a
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for monitoring exterior areas of a business. Easy to install and start up. Had to add significant cable length for 3 of the 4 cameras to reach needed camera locations. Used the solid wire (vs braided) CAT5 and cannot detect any difference in picture quality. Camera wiring pigtail comes out center of mounting base, leaving no external exposed wiring. But, be prepared - need to drill relatively large (approx 7/8”) thru-hole to pass camera cable connector(s).
customer_reviews.author: Bob Twilley

customer_reviews.title: 1 camera of 4 did not work
customer_reviews.text: Hi, I have a little problem with one of the cameras, ethernet wires that came with it, is shorter than I need, so I bought (ethernet CAT6 from 3M)... all 3 camera working good except this one, it did work only with ethernet wires that came with package, which is shorter than required distance. So, what is the best way: 1- link that 4 ethernet wires by ethernet coupler female to female. 2- buy new long ethernet wire, from another brand. and what brand will work?
customer_reviews.author: feras

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this system must purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: So I had a friend that told me I had to purchase a set so I ended up buying it because I need a new system and I’m pretty impressed it works pretty good and the Nevisians awesome it is well worth the money and I would recommend purchasing it The networking is easy to set up and there’s many features through the app that you can adjust things without going to the NVR which is awesome
customer_reviews.author: Anthony lipyanic

customer_reviews.title: can't read the fine print ?  ?  ?
customer_reviews.text: the small print is tiny and there is no support I'm going to have to wing it and hope it works. Support is in Hong Kong I'm not getting anywhere with them?
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: Camera setup works great. I've been catching all kinds of stuff going on at my new house, I would have never been able to know or prove anything had the cameras not been there. I wonder what they missed before they were installed. I had some issues with my NVR, I went through email relay with customer service. They got me back in action like a good company should. I cant speak highly enough for a CCTV system that comes with an app to view remotely and NO MONTHLY SERVICE Fees. 24/7 cameras
customer_reviews.author: Dbee32

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected.
customer_reviews.text: It does cut out for a minute every now and then. Maybe a minute every couple days. Most likely this is normal and a hardware limitation. An SSD upgrade might fix this.
customer_reviews.author: Profile name here.

customer_reviews.title: Very good NVR System
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I’ve had the system for 2 years and it runs flawlessly. 6 cameras with 1 PTZ covering the outside of my home. Would like to see some improvements in playback ease, but not a big enough issue to bring the rating down. Tech Support helped with a power adapter issue. Quick simple solution. Thank you Tech Support!
customer_reviews.author: J Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Works like a champ
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect easy to setup, easy to install on the app. Only complain is snow and small bugs make the motion sensor recored at night. But other than that very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Easily the best system I have owned
customer_reviews.text: Easily the best system I have owned. Easy and fast set-up. And the quality of the cameras are excellent. I've bought additional cameras such as the zoom bullet and dome type to add to this system. The clarity of the camera really leaves me speechless. Didn't have to do much convincing for my dad and father-in-law to purchase this system for their house.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID S.

customer_reviews.title: Two cameras died - Warranty is a joke
customer_reviews.text: Two cameras died within 15 months. RMA process is a joke - they charge you a service fee, and make you pay for shipping. The dvr and app work pretty well. Looking through video in the app is a pain, though, since there is not a way to fast forward. Will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Flynn

customer_reviews.title: Great price, Great modular features !
customer_reviews.text: These products are top notch. The cameras are made of a durable metal and don't feel like they are going to break like some of the competitor brands. The clarity on the units are amazing and I cant wait to see what new features they come out with next. Do yourself a favor and go with the upgraded lens model. You wont be disappointed ! Setting the up DVR for remote viewing was a breeze and everything just worked out of the box. 5/5 stars good job Reolink!
customer_reviews.author: Pureredlogic

customer_reviews.title: Okay but not able to hook 3 drives as stated
customer_reviews.text: Good product but NVR should have more available internal storage without hooking up 3 drives. Also when attaching a 3rd drive externally it does not work. I tried customer sevice tips and still it doesnt work.
customer_reviews.author: A_family_Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Camera quality is crystal clear. App is super easy to use. Definitely would recommend this. Update: I've owned this system just over a year now and the first camera just went out. Hopefully they will honor their 2 year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: I like my video surveillance system, I can see what's going on at home when I'm not there. I see my dog running around and chasing cats away. When I hear noise at night I don't look outside I just click on the Reolink app on my phone to see who is outside. What I like the most is that you can rewind the video and see what happened a week ago. Recommended product to my client and she purchased it right away!
customer_reviews.author: Ilenia Suarez

customer_reviews.title: Good picture quality
customer_reviews.text: Had an issue with one camera going out, but now it works again. I didn’t fiddle with it. Other than that the app is pretty easy to use and the cameras work good.
customer_reviews.author: Confessions of a Household

customer_reviews.title: Love this system and the features
customer_reviews.text: Love this system and the features. Best part is no recurring fees. Setup was easy and it just worked right away. Remote viewing is the best part and the night vision works better then expected. Will be adding more cameras.
customer_reviews.author: dce

product_meta.title: Reolink 4MP 8CH PoE Video Surveillance System, 4pcs Wired Outdoor 1440P PoE IP Cameras, 8MP 5MP 4MP Supported 8 Channel NVR Security System with 2TB HDD for 24/7 Recording RLK8-410B4
feature_bullets: Plug and Play PoE Camera System – With a simple PoE connection, users only need to plug the security camera into the NVR, making installation easy enough for beginners and convenient enough for DIY enthusiasts. Camera cables stretch up to 270ft via a CAT5 or 330ft via a CAT6 Ethernet cable.

Built-in 2TB Hard Drive – Supports 8 channels recording simultaneously. Secure your home and business 24/7 with smart motion-triggered alerts. Users can also set their NVR to automatically overwrite the oldest footage to make space for new files, or you can export those video files via a USB drive.

4MP Super HD and Vivid Night Vision – Get magnificent images and videos day or night with 1440p resolution. An advanced automatic IR-cut filter helps to capture surroundings at night for up to 100ft. Now you can see all that occurs in your home or business no matter what time of day it is.

Remote Access – The free Reolink app allows you to add an unlimited quantity of Reolink cameras for Live View. Users can you can watch security footage through WiFi-enabled or 2G, 3G, and 4G smart devices, allowing you to check in on your home or business anytime, anywhere.
2-Year Warranty ­­­­­– Users can enjoy a 30-day money back guarantee, 2-year quality warranty, and life-time tech support.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars778 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
